item.description:
For our 19th Anniversary celebration, we'll be welcoming the executive directors of two organizations based at the Institute for Humanist Studies in Albany, NY. Amanda Metskas is Executive Director of Camp Quest, Inc., and August Brunsman is the Executive Director of the Secular Student Alliance. Both organizations are focused on bringing humanism to young people.

We'll start with a pot-luck dinner at 7:30 PM. The main presentation by Amanda & August will follow brief announcements at 8:00 PM.

(It is not necessary to RSVP for this event; I'm listing it as a meetup so that you can get e-mail reminders from meetup.com)
item.name: Humanist Association of Connecticut Anniversary Meeting
